solution_line_template: Each day, Sandra will have {total_portions}/{number_of_days} = <<{total_portions}/{number_of_days}={daily_portions}>>{daily_portions} portions of formula.
Each puppy needs to be fed {daily_portions}/{number_of_puppies} = <<{daily_portions}/{number_of_puppies}={feedings_per_puppy_per_day}>>{feedings_per_puppy_per_day} times a day.
